text:
the default publication sitemap implements its own local cache via a source
writing transformer. it is disabled by default (the match has "DISABLED"
appended). hence i'm assuming that it has seen very little testing and might not
be ready for production.
if you are using this feature, please test it, provide a status report and close
the bug. otherwise we should mark it as "untested" in the default publication.
creator: nettings@apache.org
nettings@apache.org
text:
the really funny thing is that we have disabled cache *reading*, but are still
doing cache writing at a huge cost: three extra transformations, one including
disk access.
how about just chucking this out? gains a performance bonus and will make the
sitemap a lot more readable.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
please comment on this. if nobody speaks up in favor of the cache mechanism,
i'll try to get a vote for removal during code freeze.

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
I'm all for speed an ease of use. If we aren't reading from the cache, we
shouldn't be writing to the cache.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
+1 to remove the caching for 2.0 and re-introduce it in 2.0.1.

It would be great if we could move the code to the sandbox, preferrably as a module.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #4)
> It would be great if we could move the code to the sandbox, preferrably as a
module.

not sure. the current mechanism would require observers to page changes - do we
have those in place? and do we really want to go that way? writing by a
transformer via pipeline, deleting via a totally unrelated observation trigger?
i smell race conditions all over the place...

my preferred approach is to get the most out of ehcache and not implement a
custom method. if users need more performance, then mod_cache takes over. we
have a nice way of controlling mod_cache's behaviour via the <map:pipe
expires=""> parameter iiuc...

anyways i'll remove the code from the sitemap now. we can always dig it out of svn.
caching has been removed as of revision 591462
creator: nettings@apache.org
